title: League of Legends cilent screen locks up.
body:
It always seem to lock up after I save my masteries to where I cannot close it or do anything, but everything is running. 
Like champ select or friendly chat windows.

replies.body: Issues like this can be caused by third party programs that aren't interacting well with league.  If you have any running like play.tv or overwolf, disable them.  That should get you fixed up!
